body_html:
Thanks for sorting that out @marcoadurno. This looks like the right solution to me.

Yes, AFAIK, you can't recover summaries from inside a map (hopefully @mrry will correct me if I'm wrong). I'll add a note to the Dataset doc explaining this.

Note, in the future, stackoverflow might be a better place for this sort of question.

Yes, AFAIK, you can't recover summaries from inside a map (hopefully @mrry will correct me if I'm wrong). I'll add a note to the Dataset doc explaining this.
Note, in the future, stackoverflow might be a better place for this sort of question.
body:
Thanks for sorting that out @marcoadurno. This looks like the right solution to me.

Yes, AFAIK, you can't recover summaries from inside a `map` (hopefully @mrry will correct me if I'm wrong). I'll add a note to the `Dataset` doc explaining this.

Note, in the future, stackoverflow might be a better place for this sort of question.
